<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Read a value of a particular endianness from memory, for a location</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> value&#95;type, endianness endian, std::</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> alignment&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a6d9995bf8da2a0fed6fa31bce97aeebd"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> value&#95;type <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a6d9995bf8da2a0fed6fa31bce97aeebd">readAtBitAlignment</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;memory,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                   uint64&#95;t startBit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(startBit &lt; 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (startBit == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#acfdf941f45bc58470ed8423b98862486">read&lt;value&#95;type, endian, alignment&gt;</a>(memory);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Read two values and compose the result from them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    value&#95;type val&#91;2&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(&amp;val&#91;0&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a2fd576fb00a760ba803c8a171bff051a">LLVM&#95;ASSUME&#95;ALIGNED</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">               memory, (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/detail/pickalignment/#a660d2c8851fd5bfb532f9f73be4b1ba1a2fecc59ca732d5877341e57d1c746b6e">detail::PickAlignment&lt;value&#95;type, alignment&gt;::value</a>)),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(value&#95;type) &#42; 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    val&#91;0&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;0&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    val&#91;1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;1&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift bits from the lower value into place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> lowerVal = val&#91;0&#93; &gt;&gt; startBit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask off upper bits after right shift in case of signed type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> numBitsFirstVal =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(value&#95;type) &#42; 8) - startBit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    lowerVal &amp;= ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; numBitsFirstVal) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the bits from the upper value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> upperVal =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">        val&#91;1&#93; &amp; (((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; startBit) - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift them in to place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    upperVal &lt;&lt;= numBitsFirstVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lowerVal | upperVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Write a value to memory with a particular endianness, for a location</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that starts at the given bit offset within the first byte.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> value&#95;type, endianness endian, std::</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> alignment&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a60b7cc9c00de00b23725cfa29e75ca3f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a60b7cc9c00de00b23725cfa29e75ca3f">writeAtBitAlignment</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;memory, value&#95;type value,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                uint64&#95;t startBit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(startBit &lt; 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (startBit == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#add1f2d1d972957d22186f4ec92f985f6">write&lt;value&#95;type, endian, alignment&gt;</a>(memory, value);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Read two values and shift the result into them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    value&#95;type val&#91;2&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(&amp;val&#91;0&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a2fd576fb00a760ba803c8a171bff051a">LLVM&#95;ASSUME&#95;ALIGNED</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">               memory, (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/detail/pickalignment/#a660d2c8851fd5bfb532f9f73be4b1ba1a2fecc59ca732d5877341e57d1c746b6e">detail::PickAlignment&lt;value&#95;type, alignment&gt;::value</a>)),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(value&#95;type) &#42; 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    val&#91;0&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;0&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    val&#91;1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;1&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask off any existing bits in the upper part of the lower value that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we want to replace.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    val&#91;0&#93; &amp;= ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; startBit) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> numBitsFirstVal =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(value&#95;type) &#42; 8) - startBit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> lowerVal = value;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (startBit &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask off the upper bits in the new value that are not going to go into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the lower value. This avoids a left shift of a negative value, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is undefined behavior.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      lowerVal &amp;= (((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; numBitsFirstVal) - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now shift the new bits into place</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      lowerVal &lt;&lt;= startBit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    val&#91;0&#93; |= lowerVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask off any existing bits in the lower part of the upper value that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we want to replace.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    val&#91;1&#93; &amp;= ~(((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; startBit) - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Next shift the bits that go into the upper value into position.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a> upperVal = value &gt;&gt; numBitsFirstVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask off upper bits after right shift in case of signed type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    upperVal &amp;= ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a84722c6bdea9d2aa71fc07cd3d15395c">make&#95;unsigned&#95;t&lt;value&#95;type&gt;</a>)1 &lt;&lt; startBit) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    val&#91;1&#93; |= upperVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally, rewrite values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    val&#91;0&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;0&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    val&#91;1&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">byte&#95;swap&lt;value&#95;type, endian&gt;</a>(val&#91;1&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a2fd576fb00a760ba803c8a171bff051a">LLVM&#95;ASSUME&#95;ALIGNED</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">               memory, (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/detail/pickalignment/#a660d2c8851fd5bfb532f9f73be4b1ba1a2fecc59ca732d5877341e57d1c746b6e">detail::PickAlignment&lt;value&#95;type, alignment&gt;::value</a>)),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">           &amp;val&#91;0&#93;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(value&#95;type) &#42; 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace endian</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/detail">detail</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::size&#95;t ALIGN = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/detail/pickalignment/#a660d2c8851fd5bfb532f9f73be4b1ba1a2fecc59ca732d5877341e57d1c746b6e">PickAlignment&lt;ValueType, Alignment&gt;::value</a>&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/detail/packed-endian-specific-integral"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/detail/packed-endian-specific-integral/#a2e4ce0ebf99bcf666d059cf8e2db3ef4">packed&#95;endian&#95;specific&#95;integral</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
